symbols.name: sap.ui.mdc
symbols.description: The SAPUI5 MDC library. Contains the metadata driven controls and elements.
symbols.title: namespace sap.ui.mdc

symbols.name: sap.ui.mdc.base.ConditionModel
symbols.description: JSON based Model for sap.ui.mdc.base.FilterField controls. The model stores the entered values as condition objects and applies the conditions to the ListBinding of e.g. a table.

methods.name: addCondition

parameters.name: sFieldPath
parameters.description: fieldPath of the condition

parameters.name: oCondition
parameters.description: condition to be added

parameters.name: bForce
parameters.description: if set the condition will be added even if it already exist

methods.description: Adds a condition for a specified FieldPath.

methods.name: clone

parameters.name: sFieldPath
parameters.description: specifies which conditions should be copied into the clone. If not specified all conditions will be copied.

methods.description: creates a clone of the ConditionModel which contains the conditions for the sFieldPath

methods.name: createCondition

returnValue.description: the new condition object with the given fieldPath, operator and values.

parameters.name: sFieldPath
parameters.description: the fieldPath name of the condition

parameters.name: sOperator
parameters.description: the operator for the condition

parameters.name: aValues
parameters.description: the array of values for the condition

methods.description: creates a condition instance for the condition model

methods.name: createItemCondition

returnValue.description: the new condition object with the given fieldPath, the operator EEQ and the sKey and sDescription as aValues.

parameters.name: sFieldPath
parameters.description: the fieldPath name of the condition

parameters.name: sKey
parameters.description: the operator for the condition

parameters.name: sDescription
parameters.description: the description of the operator

methods.description: creates a condition instance for the Item condition

methods.name: sap.ui.mdc.base.ConditionModel.extend

parameters.name: sClassName
parameters.description: Name of the class being created

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata

methods.description:
Creates a new subclass of class sap.ui.mdc.base.ConditionModel with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo.

oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel.extend.

methods.name: getAllConditions

returnValue.description: object with array of conditions for each FieldPath

parameters.name: sFieldPath
parameters.description: fieldPath of the condition

methods.description: Returns all conditions.

methods.name: getConditions

parameters.name: sFieldPath
parameters.description: fieldPath of the condition

methods.description: Returns conditions for a specified FieldPath.

methods.name: sap.ui.mdc.base.ConditionModel.getMetadata
methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.ui.mdc.base.ConditionModel.

methods.name: indexOf

parameters.name: sFieldPath
parameters.description: fieldPath of the condition

parameters.name: oCondition
parameters.description: condition to be searched

methods.description: Determines the index of a condition for a specified FieldPath.

methods.name: insertCondition

parameters.name: sFieldPath
parameters.description: fieldPath of the condition

parameters.name: iIndex
parameters.description: index where the condition should be inserted

parameters.name: oCondition
parameters.description: condition to be inserted

parameters.name: bForce
parameters.description: if set the condition will be inserted even if it already exist

methods.description: Inserts a condition for a specified FieldPath.

methods.name: merge

parameters.name: sFieldPath
parameters.description: specifies which conditions should be removed and replaced by the conditions from the source ConditionModel

parameters.name: oCM
parameters.description: source ConditionModel.

parameters.name: sSourceFieldPath
parameters.description: specifies which conditions from the source should be merged.

methods.description: merge conditions from the source conditionModel into this instance

methods.name: removeAllConditions

parameters.name: sFieldPath
parameters.description: fieldPath of the condition

methods.description: Removes all conditions for a specified FieldPath.

methods.name: removeCondition

parameters.name: sFieldPath
parameters.description: fieldPath of the condition

parameters.name: vCondition
parameters.description: condition or index of the condition

methods.description: Removes a condition for a specified FieldPath.

methods.name: setConditions

parameters.name: oConditions
parameters.description: object of conditions for corresponding fieldPaths

methods.description: Sets conditions. All already existing conditions will be removed

symbols.title: class sap.ui.mdc.base.ConditionModel

parameters.name: oModel
parameters.description: Model instance that this binding is created for and that it belongs to

parameters.name: sPath
parameters.description: Binding path to be used for this binding

parameters.name: oContext
parameters.description: Binding context relative to which a relative binding path will be resolved

parameters.name: mParameters
parameters.description: Map of optional parameters as defined by subclasses; this class does not introduce any own parameters

constructor.description:
Creates a new ConditionModelPropertyBinding.

This constructor should only be called by subclasses or model implementations, not by application or control code. Such code should use ConditionModel#bindProperty on the corresponding model instance instead.

methods.name: sap.ui.mdc.base.ConditionModelPropertyBinding.extend

parameters.name: sClassName
parameters.description: Name of the class being created

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata

methods.description:
Creates a new subclass of class sap.ui.mdc.base.ConditionModelPropertyBinding with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo.

oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in sap.ui.model.json.JSONPropertyBinding.extend.

methods.name: sap.ui.mdc.base.ConditionModelPropertyBinding.getMetadata
methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.ui.mdc.base.ConditionModelPropertyBinding.

parameters.description: ID for the new control, generated automatically if no ID is given

parameters.name: mSettings
parameters.description: Initial settings for the new control

symbols.name: sap.ui.mdc.base.FilterOperatorConfig
symbols.description: Configuration of model-specific filter operators depending on data types.

methods.name: addOperatorsToType
methods.description: Adds one or more operator(s) (given by name or array of names) to the given type

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Not to be called by applications, just by models

methods.name: sap.ui.mdc.base.FilterOperatorConfig.extend

parameters.name: sClassName
parameters.description: Name of the class being created

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata

methods.description:
Creates a new subclass of class sap.ui.mdc.base.FilterOperatorConfig with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo.

oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in sap.ui.base.Object.extend.

methods.name: getDefaultOperator

returnValue.description: the name of the default filter operator for the given type

parameters.name: vType
parameters.description: a type or its name

methods.description: Returns the default operator for the given type

methods.name: sap.ui.mdc.base.FilterOperatorConfig.getFor

parameters.name: oModel
parameters.description: the model for which the filter operator configuration is requested

methods.description: Returns the FilterOperatorConfig for a specific model instance (and creates it lazily if required).

methods.name: getMatchingOperators

returnValue.description: the operator objects suitable to the given input string, considering the given type

parameters.name: sValue
parameters.description: the value entered so far

methods.description: Returns the possible operators for the given type and (if given) value.

methods.name: sap.ui.mdc.base.FilterOperatorConfig.getMetadata
methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.ui.mdc.base.FilterOperatorConfig.

methods.name: getOperatorsForType

returnValue.description: an array with the names of the supported filter operators

methods.description: Returns all available operators for the given type; see FilterOperatorConfig.getOperators()

methods.name: sap.ui.mdc.base.FilterOperatorConfig.registerFor

parameters.name: sModelClassName
parameters.description: the name of the model class for which the given config should be used

parameters.name: oFOC
parameters.description: the FilterOperatorConfig class (not an instance) to be used for the given model type

methods.description:
Registers a certain type of FilterOperatorConfig for the given model type. When someone requests the FilterOperatorConfig for a model of the given type, an instance of the config will be created and assigned to the model instance.

This method may only be called by the model whose type is given as first parameter sModelClassName.

symbols.title: class sap.ui.mdc.base.FilterOperatorConfig

parameters.name: sId
parameters.description: ID for the new control, generated automatically if no ID is given

parameters.name: mSettings
parameters.description: initial settings for the new control

constructor.description:
Constructor for a new SelectOption.

Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

methods.name: sap.ui.mdc.base.state.SelectOption.extend

parameters.name: sClassName
parameters.description: Name of the class being created

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata

methods.description:
Creates a new subclass of class sap.ui.mdc.base.state.SelectOption with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo.

oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in sap.ui.core.Element.extend.

methods.name: sap.ui.mdc.base.state.SelectOption.getMetadata
methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.ui.mdc.base.state.SelectOption.

methods.name: getPropertyName
methods.description:
Gets current value of property propertyName.

Name of property

methods.name: setPropertyName

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: sPropertyName
parameters.description: New value for property propertyName

methods.description:
Sets a new value for property propertyName.

Name of property

When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

symbols.name: sap.ui.mdc.base.state.UiState
symbols.description: Creates a new instance of an UiState class.

parameters.name: sId
parameters.description: ID for the new control, generated automatically if no ID is given

parameters.name: mSettings
parameters.description: initial settings for the new control

constructor.description: Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

methods.name: addSelectOption

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: oSelectOption
parameters.description: The selectOption to add; if empty, nothing is inserted

methods.description: Adds some selectOption to the aggregation selectOptions.

methods.name: destroySelectOptions

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Destroys all the selectOptions in the aggregation selectOptions.

methods.name: sap.ui.mdc.base.state.UiState.extend

parameters.name: sClassName
parameters.description: Name of the class being created

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata

methods.description:
Creates a new subclass of class sap.ui.mdc.base.state.UiState with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo.

oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in sap.ui.core.Element.extend.

methods.name: sap.ui.mdc.base.state.UiState.getMetadata
methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.ui.mdc.base.state.UiState.

methods.name: getSelectOptions
methods.description:
Gets content of aggregation selectOptions.

Select Options

methods.name: indexOfSelectOption

returnValue.description: The index of the provided control in the aggregation if found, or -1 otherwise

parameters.name: oSelectOption
parameters.description: The selectOption whose index is looked for

methods.description: Checks for the provided sap.ui.mdc.base.state.SelectOption in the aggregation selectOptions. and returns its index if found or -1 otherwise.

methods.name: insertSelectOption

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: oSelectOption
parameters.description: The selectOption to insert; if empty, nothing is inserted

parameters.name: iIndex
parameters.description: The 0-based index the selectOption should be inserted at; for a negative value of iIndex, the selectOption is inserted at position 0; for a value greater than the current size of the aggregation, the selectOption is inserted at the last position

methods.description: Inserts a selectOption into the aggregation selectOptions.

methods.name: removeAllSelectOptions

returnValue.description: An array of the removed elements (might be empty)

methods.description:
Removes all the controls from the aggregation selectOptions.

Additionally, it unregisters them from the hosting UIArea.

methods.name: removeSelectOption

parameters.name: vSelectOption
parameters.description: The selectOption to remove or its index or id

methods.description: Removes a selectOption from the aggregation selectOptions.

symbols.name: sap.ui.mdc.base.type.ConditionsType
symbols.description: This class represents conditions types. It is used to map an array of conditions to an Input or Text control

parameters.name: oFormatOptions
parameters.description: formatting options.

parameters.name: valueType
parameters.description: Type of the value of the condition (used for formatting and parsing)

parameters.name: filterOperatorConfig
parameters.description: FilterOperatorConfig to be used in the condition

parameters.name: display
parameters.description: DisplayFormat

parameters.name: onlyEEQ
parameters.description: If set parsing creates only EEQ conditions //TODO

parameters.name: fieldHelpID
parameters.description: FieldHelp to determine key and description // TODO: async request????

parameters.name: hideOperator
parameters.description: If set only the value of the condition is shown, no operator //TODO

parameters.name: maxConditions
parameters.description: Maximal allowed conditions

parameters.name: oConstraints
parameters.description: value constraints.

parameters.name: sClassName

symbols.name: sap.ui.mdc.experimental.NamedBindingModel
symbols.description:
Static Model transformation for sap.ui.model.odata.v4.ODataModel to allow using named bindings



References:
  • sap.ui.model.odata.v4.ODataModel

experimental.text:
This module is only for experimental use!
This is only a POC and maybe deleted

returnValue.description: Promise that resolves when the model has been upgraded

methods.description: Manage named list bindings
